LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.8.name: rewardValue
LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.11.node.n: The monument for the quest '[resolvedQuestName]' has been violated. Consequences will follow.
LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.11.elseNo: You completed construction of the monument.\n\nYou must not destroy it for at least [keepMonumentTicks_duration], otherwise you will anger [asker_factionName] ([goodwillChangeIfMonumentDestroyed] goodwill).
[asker_nameDef] is offended that you allowed the monument to be ruined so soon after completion.\n\nYour relations with [asker_faction_name] have fallen by [goodwillChangeIfMonumentDestroyed].
LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.12.node.n: Since the monument marker has been destroyed, a new one has been sent.
LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.13.name: constructionTimeoutTicks
LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.16.node.n: Your time limit to construct the monument has expired. [failLetterEndingCommon]
LanguageData.BuildMonumentWorker.root.nodes.18.name: thingsToDrop
